topic.title: Satellite Server
topic.shortdesc: The path included in the example below should work with most satellite installations; just replace SATELLITE_SERVER with the appropriate FQDN.

body.codeblock: # hammer medium create --name "Dell OSP Pilot" --os-family Redhat \ --path 'http://SATELLITE_SERVER/ks/dist/ks-rhel-$arch-server-$major-$version'
